content.webTitle: Clinton: ‘We must accept this result’ | The minute

fields.headline: Clinton: ‘We must accept this result’
fields.bodyText: Hillary Clinton told staff and supporters in a midday speech: “We must accept this result … Donald Trump is going to be our president … We owe him an open mind and a chance to lead.” She did not mention her likely win in the popular vote. Liberals put Trump in the White House “We are now all rooting for his success in uniting and leading this country,” the president said of Trump. “The peaceful transfer of power is one of the hallmarks of our democracy.” Trump was to visit the White House on Thursday. How do I tell my daughter? Were the polls bad, were the analysts off, was the media living in a bubble, were Trump’s opponents in denial – how did Donald J Trump win a US presidential election? In 2016? Last night? Mourn and then stand up Russian president Vladimir Putin called for a new era of “fully fledged relations” between his country and the US after Trump’s win, which was applauded in the Russian parliament. President Trump’s policy agenda “The opportunity is now here, and the opportunity is to go big and go bold,” said House speaker Paul Ryan of total Republican control of government. Senate majority leader Mitch McConnell mentioned the supreme court, tax reform and Obamacare.
